venue.name: Village Center of Thompsonville -- Valley Repertory Theater

item.description:
THE VALLEY REPERTORY COMPANY
presents
The LabWorks 15-Minute New Play Contest

These 12 new plays are funny, thought-provoking, challenging, and are sure to delight.
Chosen from over 250 plays submitted to the contest by 175 writers from four different countries!

Feb. 18, 19, 20
8 PM

Friday, February 19th
Another Dover by Jason Fregeau
Customer Service by Philip Hall
Tiger In a Cage by Arthur M. Jolly
What You Wish For by Michael R. McGuire
I Don’t Know by Terry Roueche
Apple Pie by Peter Snoad

Saturday, February 20th
Finals: The six favorite plays chosen by Thursday & Friday’s audiences

Directed by
Ken Estvanik /June Lyons, Janine Flood, Jeffrey Flood, Jason Fregeau

Featuring:
Amanda Bates
Becky Beth Benedict
Timothy Carson
Paul DiProto
Emily Engel
Josh Guenter
Logan Lopez
Stephanie Maloney
Michael May
Elizabeth Reynolds
Peter Scibak
Bruce Showalter
Mark Vogel
Laura Wittenberg

100 High Street
Enfield, CT

All Single Tickets $10
Refreshments Included !

Special Package !!!
Prepay Feb. 18 & 19
$16 for both evenings
Gives you access to
all twelve plays at a
deep discount!

Call 860-749-4665
www.valleyrep.com

Some adult themes and strong language
Reservations are strongly recommended. Seating is limited.

Play Contest Flyer: http://valleyrep.com/...

Play Contest Ticket Order Form: http://valleyrep.com/...
item.name: Valley Rep New Plays Contest #2
